File libsrc/libgODBC/ODBCGetResultCols.c

Public Functions

ODBCGetResultCols 
 int ODBCGetResultCols(SQLHSTMT hstmt,
                       int numColumns,
                       ODBC_ColumnResult *column)
Retrieve the result of an sql query. Fill the columns of the ODBC_Result structure with data from SQLExecDirect or SQLFetch. Returns zero for success. Returns -1 for an error flag. Retrieve the error number and error message with ODBCErrno() and ODBCErrMsg().

Parameters:
hstmt - A statement handle obtained from SQLAllocHandle.
numColumns - The number of columns in the result (input).
column - The column descriptions obtained from ODBCDescribeCols.

See Also:
ODBCDescribeCols
ODBCGeneralQuery
